193.「タケトラ様の家なら 町の一番奥にある| ひときわ 大きな お屋敷じゃよ。: If it's Taketora's house, it's the biggest|house in the far end of town...

194.「まずは お屋敷の南側にある| 赤い鳥居を 目指すとよい。: First, we'll go to the red torii gate on the|south side of the mansion...

195.「あとは その先の階段をのぼって道沿いだ。| おぬしもキーエンブレムが ほしいの: Now all you have to do is go up the stairs to|the path... If you want the key emblem, you'd|better go to the mansion and ask for it...
